short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chronos is a task timer and timesheet logging application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Too busy to fill in your time-sheets? Chronos takes care of it.

Create a new task, give it a description and assign a color to it, and you're ready to go. 

Click on the colored timer when you're ready to start timing your task, and Chronos will start logging your time in the background, leaving you to get on with your work.

When you're done, click on the timer again to stop timing. Then when you're ready to fill in your time-sheets , go to the totals panel to view the total amount of time spent on each task for each day of the week. 

Chronos works across Chrome, Edge and Firefox

Look out for the Professional version of Chronos offering many more useful features, coming soon.
